name: DJ Gone Rogue
description:
DJ Gone Rogue is an intense rhythm-based platformer that will have you throwing your keyboard, controller, and soon your phone (if we stop being lazy)! Control a cute little blue guy and reach the star at the end of each level while dodging musically-inclined death traps! Make sure not to fall or get squashed, zapped, or shoved into oblivion!

DJ Gone Rogue is intended for mobile platforms but we are releasing on PC/Mac to bug test and generate interest in the game. General enjoyment of DJ Gone Rogue will determine how quickly we release a more complete (and mobile) version of the game.

Team:

  • Donny Lu
  • Fernando Carrillo
  • Jason Wang
  • Peter Kong
  • Davidson Harley
  • Wyatt Sanders
  • Joelyn Lai
  • Danielle Croom
  • Zeke Cottrell
  • Hunter Bridges
Install Instructions

We recommend using your mouse to play as it emulates the use of touch controls inherent to modern mobile platforms. There is minimal keyboard/control support.

Controls (Mouse/Keyboard):
  • Hold Left Mouse Button + Swipe - Menu Navigation
  • Left + Right Arrow keys - Navigate Menu Left/RIght
  • Left Mouse Button - Select + Click quadrant of screen to Hop
  • WASD or Arrow keys - Hop
  • Escape - Pause + Cancel
Controls (Controller):
  • D Pad - Hop
  • Menu/Start/Options - Pause
